original_text: Moses took the two flat stones with God's special commands on them. He put them inside the Covenant Box. He put the poles through the rings on the box. He put the special lid on top of the box.
korean_text: 그는 또 증거판을 궤 속에 넣고 채를 궤에 꿰고 속죄소를 궤 위에 두고

sentences.original_text: Moses took the two flat stones
with God's special commands on them
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에는 하나님의 특별한 계명이 적혀 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He put them inside the Covenant Box
He put the poles through the rings on the box
He put the special lid on top of the box
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 궤 위에 특별한 뚜껑을 덮었습니다
